text: How does purchasing a template work for multiple portals. Ex: buying a template pack then modifying it and re-using it across multiple domains

I see some language in the purchase process about a “License” for a given domain… but what does that really mean… is it explicitly forbidden to modify a template (doubtful but still a serious question) and then subsequently migrating it to another portal

As an agency we’ve encountered this issue several times. The Design Manager does have a “Copy to portal” functionality that allows modules or templates to be shared across multiple portals, _but_ it won’t allow you to copy anything that has been purchased across multiple portals. We usually just end up rebuilding whatever we need. 

As far as I know there are no rules about modifying templates, but even after modifying, you can’t copy to other portals.

I'm not sure if HubSpot has a formal policy in place, but I know awhile back the portal copy tool got disabled for paid templates (only free templates seemed to have the option) to prevent this from happening.

To be safe, I'd say it depends on the individual companies. I know for instance in our templates' CSS file we specifically have terms around this scenario.
What about if you export to coded templates?
We haven’t tried that, but I would be surprised if they hadn’t thought of that.

As a note <@U24PLTUJD> - just copied a template that was protected (since it was purchased) to an HTML template (which didn’t work for clone) then I copied / pasted the code into a new coded file and it worked.
Seems like there’s some DRM stuff going on with cloning / copying of purchased templates
Makes sense, I just copied a purchased template to HTML then copy/pasted it over to a new file and that allowed copying to portal just fine

The one I used didn’t have any terms in any of the code, so I suppose that it’s “legit”, but the scenario we have in mind is to make a purchase of a pack, modify it heavily to fit our needs, then re-use the modified version across multiple portals. I would assume that this may or may not be precluded by whatever the purchase terms are for each provider but this is NOT clear anywhere in the documentation nor on the Marketplace (save for that “includes one license for <domain>“) <--- but the idea of licenses / terms is nowhere to be found on the HubSpot Marketplace

Idea: Include more information about licensing of templates for purchases, re-use, copying, etc. (and/or put a submission step in the upload /listing process that helps sellers define their terms explicitly).
